name: Brave Cano
description:
A tale of a pretentious boy, growing up to become a true hero.
A simple single-player action RPG that has everything you want.



[Game Intro]



Our lives are full of troubles.
How come fate guides us through the most unpleasant paths?
Why can’t fate offer us more pleasing and exciting adventures?
This particular boy thinks no different from us.
Because Cano’s village was boringly peaceful.

But...
Well, the rest of the story is pretty predictable.
No world is defined only with peace.
The boy had no choice but to run away, helplessly.
It seemed like fate has turned its back against him.
Now, in order to return back home, he must put an end to a massive war.

Will Cano be able to return back home safely?
I'm sorry, Cano. But you must hurry before you end up losing everything.



[Game Features]


● A Story-telling Action RPG
The countless cut-scenes make the game feel like an animated movie.
Enjoy the story that unfolds as you progress through the stages!



● Various Stages
Most stages require decent dexterity, but you will face riddling stages along the way as well.
But don’t worry, we believe you are more than capable of pushing through.



● Diverse Skill Combinations
Summon Roots to bind enemies who are running away.
And when you encounter Shielded Enemies, try using poison!
Find the optimal strategy for each stage. There’s an answer to every stage.



● Wi-Fi Not Required!
This game does not require an internet connection to play. Just install and play!
Unless your device is low on battery or you’re playing in secret, you can always enjoy the game.



● No Ads, No In-App Purchases
We all know that F2P isn’t really F2P. But we promise you.
We will never ask for any additional payments throughout the game.
